allow: Bash(powershell -Command "\(Get-Content lib/screens/vaccines_screen.dart\) -replace ''variant: BackgroundVariant'', ''preset: BackgroundPreset'' | Set-Content lib/screens/vaccines_screen.dart")
Bash(powershell -Command "\(Get-Content lib/screens/add_vaccine_screen.dart\) -replace ''variant: BackgroundVariant'', ''preset: BackgroundPreset'' | Set-Content lib/screens/add_vaccine_screen.dart")
